name: Stealing Candy From a Baby
description:
Steal the Candy from the Baby

Controls:

A/E - Move

Space - Pick up Item/Interact with Object

E - Use Active Item

1-5 - Select Item

Credits:

Music by Raffaela Frymark

Fluffy Cats Palette by Navi - https://lospec.com/palette-list/fluffy-cats

Sounds:

Rattle by gusgus26 - https://freesound.org/people/gusgus26/sounds/216057/

Baby Cry Short by aniovino - https://freesound.org/people/aniovino/sounds/571420/

Door_Open by N-RAZM - https://freesound.org/people/N-RAZM/sounds/400329/
